title: Border, 1895–1940
creditline: Gift of Mark Bitter, Robert Bitter, Ward Bitter, and Tami Bitter Cook
description: Narrow border containing a repeating anthemion-like motif. A red and pink motif alternates with a blue and green motif. Printed six across on a background of very small wavy white lines and mica pin dots. On ungrounded paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1895–1940.
1895–1940. Machine-printed. Gift of Mark Bitter, Robert Bitter, Ward Bitter, and Tami Bitter Cook. 1992-139-1.
